Actions.Name: Set Values
Actions.Tooltip: Set one or all of the values. hunger and blood potency are set for the referenced character, the global webhook is set as the default.

Actions.Name: Send Message to Discord Channel
Actions.Tooltip: Posts a message to a discord channel.

Actions.Name: Roll with Hunger
Actions.Tooltip: Rolls and includes your hunger set with the 'Set Hunger' Action

Actions.Name: Roll without Hunger
Actions.Tooltip: Rolls, ignoring your hunger and Blood potency

Actions.Name: Roll Discipline
Actions.Tooltip: Roll for discipline use. Your set blood potency and hunger affecting this roll.

Author: Christian Schulz
Description: A plugin to control the discord-bot 'Thirst' for playing Vampire - The Masquerade v5 in Discord
Name: Thirst Discord Bot Control
